description: The http://anidb.net/ch37939 [Rinjinbu]`s main character in Kirameki School Life 7. His name was originally going to be http://anidb.net/ch32430 [Kashiwazaki Sena] but http://anidb.net/ch32428 [Mikazuki Yozora] changed it at the last minute by randomly picking a bunch of characters to create the given name Semoponume.
name: Kashiwazaki Semoponume
